channel.title: Kriging on Geographer In Nature
channel.description: Recent content in Kriging on Geographer In Nature

item.title: Best Reproducable Map competition @GISRUK2019
item.description: Just before the GISRUK2019 conference, a mapping competition was announced by Robin Lovelace who was one of the instructors in the Spatial data in R workshop. I was keen on participating this competition because I use R and GIS for my PhD project, and there were some outcomes that I could use for the challenge. However, my confidence slowly diminished after I spotted the title Reproducable after the Best. What does this mean?
